column3: Meryld's ever watchful gaze is upon you, with a smile uncomfortably reminiscent of Tataru writ across her face.
Speak with the House Leveilleur maidservant.
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, it is a pleasant surprise to see youーI must say, your timing could not be more impeccable!
Lady Ameliance has entrusted me with a gift for youーan outfit that she hoped would be to your liking.
Before relinquishing it to you, I thought it would be prudent to make sure it is a proper fit. I am terribly sorry for the inconvenience, but may I trouble you to speak with the maidservant yonder?
The gift is, of course, a token of Lady Ameliance's appreciation for your deeds, but I hope you can find it in your heart to accept it as a token of gratitude from we household servants as well.
And if I may say one more thing...please continue to look after Master Alphinaud and Lady Alisaie.
Please seek out the maidservant for minute adjustments to the outfit when you have a moment.
Greetings, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, I have your clothing here.
Lady Ameliance has a sharp eye for measurements, but please humble us in case any minor adjustments are needed.
Hmmm...yes, perhaps a slight adjustment here...and tighten this up a bit...
With that, I believe we have taken up quite enough of your time. On behalf of all the servants, I wish you safe journeys ahead!
